call.game.input.mouse

Interface MouseListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DebugMenu, OverlayMenu

    public interface MouseListener
    A listener for mouse events
    Author:
    Callum

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClick(int x, int y, int state, int button)
      Called on a mouse click event
      void onMove(int x, int y)
      Called on a mouse move event

    • Method Detail

      • onClick

        void onClick(int x,
           int y,
           int state,
           int button)
        Called on a mouse click event
        Parameters:
        x - The mouse's X coordinate
        y - The mouse's Y coordinate
        state - The state of the button
        button - The button on the mouse

      • onMove

        void onMove(int x,
          int y)
        Called on a mouse move event
        Parameters:
        x - The new X coordinate of the mouse
        y - The new Y coordinate of the mouse
